column5: some times i do have problems

Mate you have made a big step realizing you made a big mistake now you need to stop smoking I am like you comfortable with death  but what keeps me going is my wife so if you want to try and date this woman you need to keep on this path of making yourself a better person  and even if she remains only a good friend at least you have her and she will help you meet a person you will meet a person when you least expect it
I was single till I was 40 met my now wife  through a dating site  I'm 54 this year I also suffer  severe Depression and severe anxiety
Sounds like he is never going to be happy he blames you for his problems
Thanks for message I love my wife more than anything I'm seeing phycologist with wife so and she seems to understand so we shall see but I think we will put it behind us
I would only because of my wife
Be honest with her it sounds like you truly love and respect her let her know your fears and discuss what you and her can do to explore her desires
I'm 53 I have had  depression and anxiety since a teenager I haven't tried to kill myself since my 20s now I just want to end it
Thanks for the information I will look into it
My wife is Bicurious and I know she acted on it but she refuses to talk about it your husband has taken a huge step support him as best as you can

I too have a wife who I know had a sexual relationship with a woman but she won't admit to it  I don't think she is bi but who knows she started watching Lesbian movies and online porn  ( note ) a friend of the women she had a relationship with told me, the only thing that bugs me is I feel she doesn't trust me but I have to be patient to support her when she tells me and you have to as well love her as best as you can

You need to have a good talk with him there is nothing he or you can do about compliments you need to tell him to be happy that be is with such a beautiful girl and those who think you are out of his league both of you need to tell them to fuck off
I would talk to her I think you broke up with her too fast find out if she is bisexual, or it was a one-off even if she is bisexual, you can have a great relationship
When he is ready he will let you know don't push it
